title: Rt. Rev. Dhiloraj Canagasabey consecrated as 15th Bishop of Colombo
content: Onlanka News – By Janaka Alahapperuma (Pix by: Sudath Silva) The Episcopal Ordination and Installation of Rt. Rev. Dhiloraj Ranjit Canagasabey as the 15th Bishop of Colombo at the Church of Sri Lanka took place this morning on 14 May at the Cathedral of Christ the Living Saviour in Bauddhaloka Mawatha, Colombo….
